text: Ataullah Behmanesh (Persian: ) (April 13, 1923 â€“ July 2, 2017) was an Iranian wrestler and sports journalist. Behmanesh was one of the oldest and most prominent Iranian sports reporters, He conducted the first live sports report in Iran from Radio in 1958 to compete in Iranian and Iraqi national Sport of athletics competitions. Behmanesh died of a stroke in Tehran on July 2, 2017 at the age of 94. ==References== Category:1923 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Iranian wrestlers Category:Iranian journalists Category:People from Kermanshah Province
title: Ataullah Behmanesh
